DOC.detailed_description: OBJECTIVES : - Determine toxicity , maximum tolerate dose , pharmacokinetics monoclonal antibody Hu3S193 patient advance colorectal carcinoma . - Determine immune response patient treat regimen . OUTLINE : This dose escalation study . Patients receive monoclonal antibody Hu3S193 ( MAB Hu3S193 ) IV 30 minute 4 hour weekly 8 week follow 2 week rest . Patients stable respond disease week 10 receive maintenance MAB Hu3S193 weekly . Courses repeat every 8 week absence disease progression unacceptable toxicity . Cohorts 3-6 patient receive escalate dos MAB Hu3S193 maximum tolerate dose ( MTD ) determine . The MTD define dose precede 3 6 patient experience dose limit toxicity .
